components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: THE VEHICLE STALLED, WHICH CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO ABRUPTLY PULL.  *JB  THERE WAS A VIBRATION WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STOPPED AT HIGH SPEEDS(DUE TO WARPED ROTORS), A TAP NOISE WAS COMING FROM THE TIMING BELT, AND THE VEHICLE WOULD DIE AT THE SPEED OF 60 MPH.  THE TIMING BELT, THE BROKEN COUNTER BALANCE, AND THE MISSING TIMING BELT TEETH WERE REPLACED.  *SCC
